shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the first remote video frame is received and decoded.

dlentry.dd:
Obsolete since v2.9.0, please use the callback in:
(1)。
(2)。

section.p: This callback is triggered when the first frame of the remote video is received and decoded.

This callback is triggered in either of the following scenarios: There are two scenarios:
The remote user joins the channel and sends the video stream.
The remote user stops sending the video stream and re-sends it after 15 seconds. Reasons for such an interruption include:
The remote user leaves the channel.
The remote user drops offline.
The user stops sending video streams.
The user disables the video module.

plentry.pd: User ID of the remote user sending the video streams.
The delay (in milliseconds) from the start of the local call to the triggering of this callback.
